articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Himachal cloudbursts: Death toll reaches 11; over 40 still missing - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Over 40 people remain missing following a series of cloudbursts on the night of July 31, which struck Kullu's Nirmand, Sainj, and Malana; Mandi's Padhar; and Shimla's Rampur subdivision.
